samba-installed.name: Samba Installed
samba-installed.description: Samba server must be installed for file sharing
samba-installed.fix: Install: sudo apt-get install samba samba-common-bin (Ubuntu/Debian) or sudo yum install samba samba-common (CentOS/RHEL)

smbpasswd-command.name: smbpasswd Command
smbpasswd-command.description: smbpasswd is required for managing Samba users

testparm-command.name: testparm Command
testparm-command.description: testparm is used to validate Samba configuration

smbclient-command.name: smbclient Command
smbclient-command.description: smbclient is used to test Samba connections and access shares
smbclient-command.fix: Install smbclient package: sudo apt-get install smbclient (Ubuntu/Debian) or sudo yum install samba-client (CentOS/RHEL)

smb-conf-file.name: smb.conf File
smb-conf-file.warning: smb.conf exists but may not be readable
smb-conf-file.fail: smb.conf not found or cannot be accessed
smb-conf-file.fix: Create smb.conf or check file permissions

extrausers-directory.name: Extrausers Directory
extrausers-directory.description: Directory for storing non-system user data
extrausers-directory.fix: Create: sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/extrausers && sudo touch /var/lib/extrausers/{passwd,group,shadow} && sudo chmod 600 /var/lib/extrausers/shadow

nsswitch-conf.name: nsswitch.conf
nsswitch-conf.description: NSS configuration for user database lookup
nsswitch-conf.fix: Edit /etc/nsswitch.conf and add 'extrausers' to passwd and group lines

samba-service.name: Samba Service
samba-service.description: Samba service must be running for file sharing
samba-service.fix: Start: sudo systemctl start smbd (or sudo service smbd start)

home-directory.name: Home Directory
home-directory.description: Base directory for Samba user home directories
home-directory.fail: Home directory not found or inaccessible
home-directory.fix: Create: sudo mkdir -p /home/samba && sudo chown root:root /home/samba && sudo chmod 755 /home/samba

samba-config-valid.name: Samba Configuration Valid
samba-config-valid.description: Samba configuration must be syntactically correct

passdb-backend.name: Passdb Backend
passdb-backend.description: Must be set to 'tdbsam' for this application
passdb-backend.pass: Passdb backend is correctly set to 'tdbsam'
passdb-backend.fail: Passdb backend is not set to 'tdbsam' (required for this application)
passdb-backend.fix: Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf [global] section and set: passdb backend = tdbsam

security-mode.name: Security Mode
security-mode.description: Must be set to 'user' for this application
security-mode.pass: Security mode is correctly set to 'user'
security-mode.fail: Security mode is not set to 'user' (required for this application)
security-mode.fix: Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf [global] section and set: security = user

force-user.name: Force User
force-user.description: [homes] section must have force user = root
force-user.pass: Force user is correctly set to 'root'
force-user.fail: Force user is not set to 'root' in [homes] section (required for this application)
force-user.fix: Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf [homes] section and set: force user = root

force-group.name: Force Group
force-group.description: [homes] section must have force group = root
force-group.pass: Force group is correctly set to 'root'
force-group.fail: Force group is not set to 'root' in [homes] section (required for this application)
force-group.fix: Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf [homes] section and set: force group = root

running-as-root.name: Running as Root
running-as-root.description: Application must run with root privileges for user and Samba management
running-as-root.fail: Application is not running as root (required for this application)
running-as-root.fix: Run the application with sudo or as root user: sudo ./sambamanager

access-based-share-enum.name: Access Based Share Enum
access-based-share-enum.description: [global] section must have access based share enum = yes
access-based-share-enum.pass: Access based share enum is correctly set to 'yes'
access-based-share-enum.fail: Access based share enum is not set to 'yes' in [global] section (required)
access-based-share-enum.fix: Edit /etc/samba/smb.conf [global] section and set: access based share enum = yes
